name: Augur Of Light
description:
Augur of Light is a first-person puzzle game, where you adventure in a Finnish island solving puzzles.

To complete the game, you must solve 5 puzzles and the tutorial.

We take inspiration from “Amnesia: The Dark Descent”, “Soma”, “The Vanishing of Ethan Carter” and “What Remains of Edith Finch”.

We made this game as a school project about coping mechanisms for depression. We worked together with mental industry professionals.

Join our discord to join to see our development and become one of our testers. https://Discord.gg/tCXSguw

Although there are known, effective treatments for mental disorders, between 76% and 85% of people in low- and middle- income countries receive no treatment for their disorder. This is the problem we are trying to tackle. And we want to make games that matter. 

We're not sure if the game is helpful, as more testing needs to be done, but we hope you enjoy the experience nonetheless.
